column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Marketing-wise it's brilliant: Gets LEY-FDC members to get in on the first day of the year and start accruing more points
column2: plus the gift certificates encourage you to come back (perhaps with friends
column3: since you already know part of your meal is subsidized).  My only worry was that we'd be in the PJ-minority
column4: and that 'civilians' would be dining with us.  WRONG.  Everybody
column5: and I do mean EVERYBODY (including the employees) were in pajamas.  Hilarious.  It also makes it perfectly acceptable to people-watch
column6: because we're all in on the joke.  I even ran into (PJ-clad) people I knew there -- turns out this is an annual event
column7: and people look forward to it all year!
